content.d: Yu-senpaaai~, what do you think about this pose?
Phew, I did it. It feels like Kasumin’s really leveled up her cuteness. That should be all for today......
Huh? Kasumi-chan, you only practiced your poses, right? What about the practice routine that Ai-chan and Setsuna-chan made?
You should also try the lung capacity training exercises that Mia-chan and Emma-chan came up with!
I want to see Kasumi-chan become even cuter through other practices as well!!
Aaah! I’ll do my best with everything~~~!
